name: carping
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of complaining all the time about matters that are not important: It's unclear what the final effect of all this carping will be. It can be hard for a new leader to deal with carping from the sidelines.
More examplesFewer examplesDespite all the carping, the project will go forward.
